meanings.definition: A process of treating steel to make it resistant to rust.
meanings.sent1: The bluing of the steel helped protect it from rusting.
meanings.sent2: The bluing process made the metal strong and durable.
meanings.sent3: The steel felt proud after its bluing treatment, knowing it was now shielded from rust.
meanings.sent4: The bluing of the steel was like a suit of armor against the enemy of rust.
meanings.sent5: The bluing process transformed the steel into a rust-fighting warrior.

meanings.definition: A blue dye used in laundry to counteract yellowing.
meanings.sent1: Mom added bluing to the laundry to keep the whites bright.
meanings.sent2: The bluing dye restored the faded fabric to its original color.
meanings.sent3: The bluing made the laundry look like a clear blue sky.
meanings.sent4: The bluing dye worked like magic, banishing the yellow stains.
meanings.sent5: The bluing transformed the laundry into a sea of fresh blue hues.

meanings.definition: The act of turning blue in color.
meanings.sent1: The bluing of the skin indicated a lack of oxygen.
meanings.sent2: His bluing face showed he was feeling very cold.
meanings.sent3: The bluing of the sky made it seem like a giant blueberry.
meanings.sent4: The bluing of the ocean at dusk was a breathtaking sight.
meanings.sent5: The bluing of the flower petals gave them a mystical aura.
